# DeAI Nexus Pro

> Real-time Bittensor subnet intelligence platform for miners, validators, and TAO investors.

DeAI Nexus Pro provides institutional-grade analytics for the Bittensor decentralised AI network, including live subnet valuations, emissions data, alpha pricing, and P/E ratio signals.

## Key Pages

- /: Dashboard — live TAO price, network overview, TAO/BTC ratio chart, subnet market caps
- /subnet-explorer: Subnet Explorer — sortable table of all 64+ Bittensor subnets with APY, Sharpe ratio, alpha price, emissions share, and fundamental scores
- /valuation-tools: Valuation Tools — fair value calculator (OpEx / Emissions model), DCF model, and custom score weighting framework
- /research: Research — curated Bittensor research reports and subnet deep-dives
- /intelligence: Intelligence — live Bittensor ecosystem news and network updates
- /reports: Reports — downloadable subnet analysis reports

## Data Sources

- TAO price: CoinGecko API (live)
- Subnet emissions and alpha prices: TaoStats API / Bittensor network data
- Historical TAO/BTC ratio: CoinGecko historical endpoint

## About

Built by DeAI Strategies — https://deaistrategies.io
Contact: team@deaistrategies.io
